name: Mission
description:
You have landed on an alien planet. Your mission is to collect rock, plant and animal samples. Rocks and plants are easy but the creatures that live there see you
as a MONSTER. You must slowly earn their trust before you can take them to the ship.

Controls:
WASD to move
Space to Jump
Left mouse click to pickup and drop objects

Gameplay video: https://youtu.be/eKHSrYY-VjQ
